column1: Smoque BBQ////Tried Smoque BBQ while on vacation in Chicago. This is honestly some of the best BBQ I have had. It makes me sad that in Los Angeles we lack good BBQ. The staff was attentive and helpful. They are more than happy to find you a seat once you place your order. They also bring the food to your table and cleanup once you are done. The food was amazing!
